segment.source: File Type Associations Results Pane
segment.target: File Type Associations Results Pane

segment.source: File Type Associations Results Pane
segment.target: File Type Associations Results Pane

segment.source: File Type Associations Results Pane
segment.target: File Type Associations Results Pane

segment.source: The File Type Associations Results pane in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console displays a list of the available file type associations.
segment.target: The File Type Associations Results pane in the Application Virtualization Server Management Console displays a list of the available file type associations.

segment.source: Users can see a list of file type extensions and the applications to which they correspond.
segment.target: Users can see a list of file type extensions and the applications to which they correspond.

segment.source: Right-click any application extension to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: Right-click any application extension to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: Delete
segment.target: Delete

segment.source: Deletes the file name extension from the list.
segment.target: Deletes the file name extension from the list.

segment.source: Properties
segment.target: Properties

segment.source: Displays the Properties dialog box for the selected application extension.
segment.target: Displays the Properties dialog box for the selected application extension.

segment.source: This dialog box has the following tabs:
segment.target: This dialog box has the following tabs:

segment.source: General tab—Displays general information about the file type association, including the application icon and name.
segment.target: General tab—Displays general information about the file type association, including the application icon and name.

segment.source: Icon—Displays the selected icon for the associated file type.
segment.target: Icon—Displays the selected icon for the associated file type.

segment.source: Extension—Displays the extension for the file type.
segment.target: Extension—Displays the extension for the file type.

segment.source: File Type Description—Displays a brief description of the file type.
segment.target: File Type Description—Displays a brief description of the file type.

segment.source: You can edit this field.
segment.target: You can edit this field.

segment.source: Open files with this application—Enables you to choose an application from the drop-down list of available applications.
segment.target: Open files with this application—Enables you to choose an application from the drop-down list of available applications.

segment.source: Icon Path—Enables you to enter the complete path to the icon file (ICO) or to browse for the ICO file.
segment.target: Icon Path—Enables you to enter the complete path to the icon file (ICO) or to browse for the ICO file.

segment.source: Advanced tab—Displays detailed information about the file type.
segment.target: Advanced tab—Displays detailed information about the file type.

segment.source: Action—Displays a list of the available actions for the associated file type.
segment.target: Action—Displays a list of the available actions for the associated file type.

segment.source: You can add new actions, edit existing actions, set an action as a default, or delete actions.
segment.target: You can add new actions, edit existing actions, set an action as a default, or delete actions.

segment.source: Content Type—Displays a description of the contents of the file type.
segment.target: Content Type—Displays a description of the contents of the file type.

segment.source: If this field is left blank, the client will fill it.
segment.target: If this field is left blank, the client will fill it.

segment.source: Perceived Type—Displays the kind of file type.
segment.target: Perceived Type—Displays the kind of file type.

segment.source: You can select one of the options from the drop-down list or add your own.
segment.target: You can select one of the options from the drop-down list or add your own.

segment.source: Confirm open after download—Select this check box to display a confirmation message after an application is loaded.
segment.target: Confirm open after download—Select this check box to display a confirmation message after an application is loaded.

segment.source: Always show extension—Select this check box to specify that extensions should be shown even when the user requests that the system hide the extensions for known file types.
segment.target: Always show extension—Select this check box to specify that extensions should be shown even when the user requests that the system hide the extensions for known file types.

segment.source: Add to new menu—Select this check box to specify that the extension or extensions should be listed in the shell's New Extensions list.
segment.target: Add to new menu—Select this check box to specify that the extension or extensions should be listed in the shell's New Extensions list.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the Application Virtualization Server Management Console help system.
segment.target: Displays the Application Virtualization Server Management Console help system.

segment.source: Right-click anywhere in the Results pane that is not on an extension to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.
segment.target: Right-click anywhere in the Results pane that is not on an extension to display a pop-up menu that contains the following elements.

segment.source: Refresh
segment.target: Refresh

segment.source: Refreshes the Results pane.
segment.target: Refreshes the Results pane.

segment.source: Export List
segment.target: Export List

segment.source: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.
segment.target: Creates a tab-delimited text file that contains the contents of the Results pane.

segment.source: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.
segment.target: This item displays a standard File Save dialog box where you specify the location for the text file you are creating.

segment.source: View
segment.target: View

segment.source: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.
segment.target: Changes the appearance and content of the Results pane.

segment.source: Arrange/Line up Icons
segment.target: Arrange/Line up Icons

segment.source: Organizes the icons in the Results pane.
segment.target: Organizes the icons in the Results pane.

segment.source: Help
segment.target: Help

segment.source: Displays the help system.
segment.target: Displays the help system.

segment.source: Related topics
segment.target: Related topics

segment.source: Server Management Console: File Type Associations Node
segment.target: Server Management Console: File Type Associations Node
